column2: "ナレーション"

"A strange castle suddenly appeared on the
battlefield, causing the entire battle one-sided."

"It's called a Devil Castle, and it creates
a barrier surrounding it, called a Devil Barrier.
It's defensive capabilities are immense."

"You cannot attack nor retreat.
You can only be overwhelmed."

"The Demons that are summoned from the Devil Castle,
use their numbers to overwhelm and outnumber their victims."

"The situation was no longer clear.
There was no hope, only defeat."

"But all of this changed, when a Guardian
from another world, saved a princess from
certain doom, a savior of shining light."

"The overwhelming power of the light shall
be forever carved into the history of this world."

"Our mission is to halt the enemy's
assault, and defeat the
Devil Barriers and the Devil Castle."

"Also, the enemy is based from within
the Devil Castle, as well as the
Devil Castle itself."

"My forces are busy fighting the Demons
summoned from the Devil Castle, but
we're slowly being pushed back."

"The Devil Castle is the source of
these vile monstrosities. Untill
it's defeated, we cannot seize victory."

"The Devil Castle is at the heart of
the enemy's base..."

"So how do we deal with the Devil
Barriers surrounding the Devil
Castle, wouldn't that take a while?"

"We have a holy weapon for that
purpose."
"This is a Buster Tower."

"Using the power of the Buster
Tower, we'll be able to take
down the Devil Barriers."

"However, I wasn't strong enough
to control it, using my strength."

"It did, however, react strongly to
your power. It's stablized and
should be ready for use."

"As of now, you can use the Buster
Tower and summon the only thing
that can break those barriers,
the Buster Pile!"

"Watch out! The enemy has
begun its assault! We don't
have enough time for chit-chat!"

"We'll need to use the Buster Tower
to destroy the Devil Barriers
and the Devil Castle from within!"
"Yes, just as you've said."

"Another thing to remember,
we'll lose if this tower is
destroyed."

"We're barely getting by,
however, we'll do our best!"

"I'll do my best to support!
Now let's give it our all! "
